name: AF2 Consulting
description: A2F Consulting is a US and Germany based boutique consulting firm and provides a broad range of advisory services on financial and private sector development, including policy advice, economic studies and surveys, assessments and evaluations of institutions and programs across the globe. The company was established in 2007. Our teams consist of highly experienced experts in financial and public sector issues with cross-regional institution-building and technical assistance backgrounds in all facets of financial services, including Microfinance, SME Banking, Rural Finance, Gender and Financial Inclusion, Technology, Process Optimization and Change Management. We also bring management, training and consulting experience with top-tier institutions in the European Union and the United States.
features: A2F Consulting is an international consulting firm and provides a broad range of advisory services around the globe.
carried out assignments in over 80 countries around the world.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: boutique consulting firm and provides a broad range of advisory services
ShortDescription: A2F Consulting is a US and Germany based boutique consulting firm and provides a broad range of advisory services on financial and private sector development, including policy advice, economic studies and surveys, assessments and evaluations of institutions and programs across the globe.
enhanced_description: AF2 Consulting (also referred to as A2F Consulting in its descriptions) is a US and Germany-based boutique consulting firm established in 2007. It provides a broad range of global advisory services, having completed assignments in over 80 countries. The firm specializes in financial and private sector development, offering policy advice, economic studies, surveys, assessments, and evaluations of institutions and programs. Their team comprises highly experienced experts in financial and public sector issues, with a strong background in cross-regional institution-building and technical assistance across all facets of financial services, including Microfinance, SME Banking, Rural Finance, Gender and Financial Inclusion, Technology, Process Optimization, and Change Management. AF2 Consulting also provides management, training, and consulting experience gained from top-tier institutions in the European Union and the United States. Furthermore, the firm aims to support organizations in enhancing their talent acquisition strategies and optimizing HR processes.
key_use_cases: Advisory services on financial and private sector development
Policy advice in financial and private sector development
Assessments and evaluations of institutions and programs
Institution-building and technical assistance in financial services (e.g., Microfinance, SME Banking, Rural Finance, Gender and Financial Inclusion)
Optimizing talent acquisition processes for faster and more efficient hiring
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
competitive_advantages: Global reach and experience with assignments in over 80 countries
Dual US and Germany-based operations for cross-regional expertise
Boutique consulting firm approach, suggesting specialized and tailored services
Highly experienced experts in financial and public sector issues

Experience with top-tier institutions in the European Union and the United States
